But now the national parks have been restored and Uganda's wildlife is once again thriving. This is a celebration of their survival.

programme.title: Fish Tank Kings S2E11
programme.desc: Upon arrival at Craig and Nancy Schupke's home for what he assumes is a run-of-the-mill tank renovation, Mat is stunned to find himself standing on top of one of the most unique aquariums he's ever encountered. Below him is a 25000 gallon saltwater lagoon that has fallen out of care, and what once resembled a vibrant reef is now a murky puddle with algae-caked corals and brown water.

programme.title: Wild Sri Lanka E2
programme.desc: The plains of Sri Lanka offer a wildlife spectacle to rival Africa's Serengeti. The landscape may seem timeless, but everything is in a state of constant change. Situated at the point where two tropical oceans meet, the island is deluged by two separate monsoons each year. It is a climate that every living thing must adapt to by changing, migrating and sometimes by forming unlikely alliances.

programme.title: The Lady With 700 Cats
programme.desc: There is never a dull moment at the Cat House on the Kings, a 12-acre sanctuary for abandoned cats in California, where founder Lynea Lattanzio devotes her home to keeping more than 700 cats alive. This film follows Lynea and her team as they try to save a rescued kitten's life, take a trip to Catalina Island to trap and save feral felines and bring all hands on deck to find a missing cat.

programme.title: Counting Tigers
programme.desc: A film that goes behind the largest wildlife survey in the world to count the most majestic wild animal on earth: Tiger.

programme.title: Otter Town
programme.desc: Meet the Riversiders and the Wildlings, two very different otter families growing up in one of the busiest islands in the world Singapore. Natural born city-slickers, the Riversiders have made the heart of this bustling town their home. The Wildlings instead have uncovered a rare patch of wilderness to call their own. For both life is an endless challenge from from flash floods to hungry crocs they face adversity with unique otter spirit. Join them and discover their endless adventures in the ultimate Otter city.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Zoo S2E7
programme.desc: A Mandrill named Tatu has keepers working around the clock in a life or death struggle to solve a medical mystery and save its life. Cedric the anaconda hasn't eaten in months but no one knows why its suddenly turned its nose up at food, and a blue-eyed goat named Talula has a date with the dentist, but only of her keepers can catch her.

programme.title: Snakes In The City: Snake Charmer
programme.desc: Wild woman Siouxsie Gillet is a true snake charmer. Together with boyfriend Simon Keys, she rescues snakes from sticky situations. With an ever-growing tattoo collection, sporting her signature pink hair; it's hard not to notice that Siouxsie rocks! This program features the drama and humour of the series while highlighting some of Siouxsie's most epic captures. We'll witness one of her first calls to catch a speeding forest cobra, experience her love of pythons, and feel the tension when she bags her first Black Mamba!

programme.title: Monster Fish S4E2 !
programme.desc: Nicknamed the “linebackers of the sea” for their wide, stalky bodies, bull sharks are rumored to be moving inland, even surviving in freshwater 2,000 miles upriver. To separate fact from fiction, Zeb Hogan is teaming up with some of Florida's leading shark experts on a quest to catch a “river shark” and to determine the truth behind their deadly reputation.

programme.title: Monster Fish: Fantastic Beasts
programme.desc: From the waterways of Argentina to the coral archipelago of Florida, Zeb Hogan chases four legendary fish that each sound like they came straight out of a horror movie. ^A fish with fangs to rival Dracula... a ray with a hidden weapon... a self-beaching, bird-eating catfish... and an ocean giant rumored to have developed a taste for human flesh...^Zeb is on a mission to catch the fish behind the legends and find out once and for all if they live up to their monstrous reputations.

programme.title: Snakes In The City S4E8
programme.desc: Simon and Siouxsie chase down mambas all over the city and they call in the fire brigade to help Simon with one of his most dangerous captures yet!

programme.title: World's Weirdest S3E3
programme.desc: Witness freak encounters, unexpected assaults and killer animal instincts - these are the World's Weirdest Sneak Attacks. This episode showcases the most shocking and unusual animal encounters, including a cyclist who crashes into an antelope, a man who finds a fish in his urethra and a relocation of an alligator found in a highway ditch becomes disastrous.

programme.title: Wild Uganda
programme.desc: Uganda is still what travellers consider an 'insider tip'. Off the tourist map, a place still in the shadows of its past. Visitors, including scientists and conservationists, had a difficult time in the civil war-stricken country. Poaching had endangered many of Uganda's most iconic animals including Mountain gorillas, cave elephants, the chimpanzees and even the tree-dwelling lions. But now the national parks have been restored and Uganda's wildlife is once again thriving. This is a celebration of their survival.

programme.title: Botswana E2
programme.desc: Botswana is home to the largest male lions on the planet but only one out of eight males ever makes it to adulthood. Lion cubs start their vulnerable life and face threats coming from all sides. It takes years for them to learn all the skills to become an apex predator and they must adapt to the group or the environment in order to survive, like the pride politics and hierarchy.

programme.title: Betty White Goes Wild!
programme.desc: The Emmy Award winner takes us on a personal, intimate journey with unique access to three of America's top zoos and safari parks. Sharing her special VIP backstage pass, Betty White gives the audience an exclusive cat's eye view and face-to-face encounters with ten of the planet's most amazing cats. And she's on a mission... to get us to love them just as much as she does.

programme.title: Little Monkey House
programme.desc: Five orphaned baby Vervet monkeys venture through a foster mother program at a primate rehabilitation center in South Africa. We watch the monkeys arrive as helpless infants at the Vervet Monkey Foundation, then follow their growth into intelligent, playful juveniles.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Zoo S2E8
programme.desc: The entire zoo is on baby watch as Phoebe the elephant goes into labor. It could be three days or 30 days before the big event but no matter how long Phoebe's keepers aren't going anywhere until she delivers. A dentist makes a house call to perform a root canal on Aurora the Polar Bear, and a family of flying foxes, better known as bats, get their annual exam.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Zoo Wild Women Compilation
programme.desc: At the Columbus Zoo, it takes a fierce group of females to care for all of its 7,000 different animal species; Suzi helps hand raise orphaned cheetah cubs, Dr. Katie helps a keeper diagnose her beloved skunk. Dr. Priya tag teams a zebra shark exam with her husband, Ramon and Dr. Jan helps a sick pair of unlikely and newborn animal friends get back into pasture.

programme.title: Zeb's Big Fish: Giant Goonch
programme.desc: Zeb Hogan is heading out on a high stakes adventure down the last great, undammed river of Asia, the Salween. Unexplored after fifty years of military rule, it's a refuge to some of Asia's last endangered species. Zeb has heard reports of catfish the size of pick-up trucks and fish species found nowhere else on Earth. But parts of this river face a new threat: hundreds of dams. Can Zeb uncover giants lurking in the depths of the Salween and protect its pristine ecosystem before it's too late?

programme.title: Wild Hunters: Deadly Killers Of Africa
programme.desc: Journey across Africa exploring the continent's most iconic and deadliest predators. Cats, crocs and canines battle every day for survival using a combination of finely tuned weapons and hunting strategies. These African stories are a show of raw power, strength and endurance. An awe-inspiring display of the fierce, everyday battles fought in the wild.

programme.title: Fish Tank Kings S2E13 !
programme.desc: Living Color is taking on a special project that has the potential to change the lives of hundreds of young students. By donating an educational exhibit to Galaxy Elementary, Living Color hopes to foster an interest in biology in the youngsters who attend the school. The team comes up with an open aquarium that will allow the students to physically interact with the specimens inside.

programme.title: Dead By Dawn E3
programme.desc: An elite group of predators call the African savanna home, and many emerge only under cover of darkness to hunt through the night. The creatures who inhabit this hidden world range from those with lightning fast attacks, to others so powerful they can reshape the landscape. Here, only the toughest survive til dawn.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol S6E4
programme.desc: The first days of autumn bring a new vet to Pol Veterinary Services. Hailing from Georgia, Dr. Elizabeth Grammer is the latest addition to Team Pol and she's arrived not a moment too soon. Her first weeks bring big surprises and helpful lessons as she learns the ropes at Pol Clinic. First up for Dr. Elizabeth - a tag-along trip with Doc to one of his regular clients: Clay Knob. It's a two-part lesson as Dr. Pol trains the rookie on heard health checks... and mixing it up with Dale and Phil. Now it's Dr. Emily's turn to train Dr. Elizabeth. The Dale Lehnert dubbed 'Georgia Dream Team'are tabbed to handle and LDA back at Clay Knob and Dr. Emily walks Dr. Elizabeth through her first Flip 'N Stitch. Soon, Dr. Elizabeth gets her first solo case - but this one involves a pair of massive problems: Bruce the Mastiff's swollen scrotum following a botched castration at another office.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Zoo Wild Women Compilation
programme.desc: At the Columbus Zoo, it takes a fierce group of females to care for all of its 7,000 different animal species; Suzi helps hand raise orphaned cheetah cubs, Dr. Katie helps a keeper diagnose her beloved skunk. Dr. Priya tag teams a zebra shark exam with her husband, Ramon and Dr. Jan helps a sick pair of unlikely and newborn animal friends get back into pasture.

programme.title: When Sharks Attack S5E1
programme.desc: Texas may be best known for its wide-open plains, but it also has a thriving beach scene. The waters of the Gulf are home to a range of shark species? which isn't usually a problem for humans. But in 2010 and 2011, something changes. Six terrifying attacks leave locals fearing for their safety at the beach. A team of expert investigators take a closer look at would could be the cause of these mysterious and harrowing attacks.

programme.title: Hunter Hunted S4E1
programme.desc: In the fourth season of this popular show, Hunter & Hunted continues to investigate selective animal attacks on humans, employing the latest in forensic technology and scientific discovery to deconstruct and analyze some of the most startling incidents on record.

programme.title: Last Devils
programme.desc: This one-hour special program explores the incredible and complex lives of the last Tasmanian devils on Earth. We will get to know the characters behind the legends, learn surprising social secrets, witness the birth of a new generation and see how their expert hunting and tracking skills have made them Tasmania's top predator.

programme.title: World's Weirdest Compilations E3
programme.desc: There are almost as many approaches to parenthood as there are animals on Earth, but the way some animal parents act, it can seem like a miracle their kids survive at all. In this episode we meet the animal kingdom's most dysfunctional parents. Some are just plain strange, others are horrifying, but it's all in the name of winning the game of reproduction.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol S6E5
programme.desc: It's not all business for the Pols this week as they find time away from the clinic to work on their lake house. But before kicking back, Dr. Pol must treat a wide array of clients including a camel with a limp, an enormous breeding bull, and a hedgehog in a prickly situation. They'll have to work hard to play hard this week! Dr. Pol starts the day off with the first farm call of the day to visit a creature unique to Central Michigan. Sasha, the dromedary camel, is having some trouble walking Back at the clinic, Dr. Brenda meets her first client of the day, Bella, a dachshund who has quite literally gotten stuck with the short end of the stick. Owner Chris Edmonds believes she may be choking. Later, when the sun goes down on Michigan, an emergency arises at the clinic. Tammy and Sydney arrive with their cat, Wiki, who acting erratically and Dr. Emily will have to work quickly to save his life. Finally, after a few run-ins with rose bushes, hard work with a chainsaw, and a che.

programme.title: Predator Fails E1
programme.desc: There is no greater predatory testing ground than the African Savannah. Its greatest hunters: the lion, Nile crocodile and cheetah, are at the top of the pile here. In this episode, these top predators will show you what it really takes to make the ultimate kill.

programme.title: Fish Tank Kings S2E14
programme.desc: South Florida's PB Catch restaurant was built on the cutting-edge of contemporary design but is missing one element to tie the decor to the cuisine. Living Color is tasked with building a tank that is unlike any of their previous projects. Owner Thierry Beaud doesn't want coral, he wants crystals, he doesn't want intricacy, he wants simplicity, concepts completely foreign to Living Color.

programme.title: Dead By Dawn E4
programme.desc: The Costa Rican jungle plays host to a twisted game of survival as the sun goes down. Legions of strange predators pit their weapons against the death defying defenses of their prey. In the high canopy, prey avoids the death that stalks the forest floor, but monsters don't play by the rules. It's not a matter of if they'll face danger, but when.

Any shark hunting these beasts needs to use brute strength or be exceptionally clever or both! But when a third player enters the game, the scales tip. Who will win?

programme.title: Monster Fish S4E4
programme.desc: The Pacific Northwest is known for big things like giant redwoods, sweeping coastlines and massive runs of salmon. But Zeb Hogan is looking for a goliath that's so elusive that he scours every nook and cranny of the rivers here to find it. He's after the green sturgeon, a monster fish that can grow up to seven feet long, live up to 70 years, and has been around since the days of the dinosaurs.

programme.title: When Sharks Attack S5E2
programme.desc: A small stretch of Florida's coastline, near New Smyrna Beach, has the unfavorable title of 'the shark attack capital of the world.' Since records began in the 1800s, more than two hundred victims have been attacked here; which means, humans are more likely to be bitten here, than anywhere else on the planet. In order to help keep local residents safe, experts investigate various potential causes of the high number of attacks. What they find, is a perfect storm of natural and manmade factors..

programme.title: Hunter Hunted S4E2
programme.desc: In the fourth season of this popular show, Hunter & Hunted continues to investigate selective animal attacks on humans, employing the latest in forensic technology and scientific discovery to deconstruct and analyze some of the most startling incidents on record.

programme.title: World's Deadliest Compilations E3
programme.desc: On the savannah in Africa, every day is a battle of wills. The will to live, the will to eat, the will to mate- every animal plays a dangerous game just to keep surviving. Predators and prey alike fight to keep their bloodline going, facing danger from everywhere in their environment.

programme.title: The Hidden Kingdoms Of China E1
programme.desc: Hidden in the remote mountains, almost 16,000ft above sea level, China's most tenacious wildlife face daily battles to survive. Follow a fiercely determined snow leopard mother as she teaches her cub vital life lessons; watch a family of Tibetan fox face a formidable feline hunter to protect their precious young; and admire the stealth and agility of the one of the world's smallest cats.

programme.title: Predator Fails E2
programme.desc: Follow some of the strangest hunters in the world as we experience their hunting trials and tribulations when they target and stalk prey. What strategies help them secure a meal and what perfectly laid plans backfire? These bizarre hunters often have one key asset that they rely on for their survival. Yet, while the predator is perfectly adapted for the hunt, the prey is perfectly adapted to survive.

programme.title: Monster Fish S1E1
programme.desc: Zeb Hogan continues his quest to find and protect the world's largest freshwater fish in the frigid rivers of Mongolia. Known as Hucho taimen, the gigantic tout ruled the rivers of northern Asia for centuries, but they have started to disappear. As winter approaches, Zeb is up against a tight deadline to spot this enormous predator.

programme.title: Hunter Hunted S4E2
programme.desc: In the fourth season of this popular show, Hunter & Hunted continues to investigate selective animal attacks on humans, employing the latest in forensic technology and scientific discovery to deconstruct and analyze some of the most startling incidents on record.

programme.title: World's Deadliest Compilations E3
programme.desc: On the savannah in Africa, every day is a battle of wills. The will to live, the will to eat, the will to mate- every animal plays a dangerous game just to keep surviving. Predators and prey alike fight to keep their bloodline going, facing danger from everywhere in their environment.

programme.title: The Hidden Kingdoms Of China E1
programme.desc: Hidden in the remote mountains, almost 16,000ft above sea level, China's most tenacious wildlife face daily battles to survive. Follow a fiercely determined snow leopard mother as she teaches her cub vital life lessons; watch a family of Tibetan fox face a formidable feline hunter to protect their precious young; and admire the stealth and agility of the one of the world's smallest cats.

programme.title: Predator Fails E2
programme.desc: Follow some of the strangest hunters in the world as we experience their hunting trials and tribulations when they target and stalk prey. What strategies help them secure a meal and what perfectly laid plans backfire? These bizarre hunters often have one key asset that they rely on for their survival. Yet, while the predator is perfectly adapted for the hunt, the prey is perfectly adapted to survive.

programme.title: Monster Fish S1E1
programme.desc: Zeb Hogan continues his quest to find and protect the world's largest freshwater fish in the frigid rivers of Mongolia. Known as Hucho taimen, the gigantic tout ruled the rivers of northern Asia for centuries, but they have started to disappear. As winter approaches, Zeb is up against a tight deadline to spot this enormous predator.

programme.title: When Sharks Attack S5E2
programme.desc: A small stretch of Florida's coastline, near New Smyrna Beach, has the unfavorable title of 'the shark attack capital of the world.' Since records began in the 1800s, more than two hundred victims have been attacked here; which means, humans are more likely to be bitten here, than anywhere else on the planet. In order to help keep local residents safe, experts investigate various potential causes of the high number of attacks. What they find, is a perfect storm of natural and manmade factors..

programme.title: Hunter Hunted S4E2
programme.desc: In the fourth season of this popular show, Hunter & Hunted continues to investigate selective animal attacks on humans, employing the latest in forensic technology and scientific discovery to deconstruct and analyze some of the most startling incidents on record.

programme.title: World's Deadliest Compilations E3
programme.desc: On the savannah in Africa, every day is a battle of wills. The will to live, the will to eat, the will to mate- every animal plays a dangerous game just to keep surviving. Predators and prey alike fight to keep their bloodline going, facing danger from everywhere in their environment.

programme.title: Fish Tank Kings S2E15
programme.desc: One of New York's hotels is looking to build upon its reputation. Living Color must create a tank that is unique and must also serve a practical purpose. The hotel architect Frank Denner's vision is a cylindrical aquarium that completely and seamlessly conceals a structural column. The idea is simple but the size and shape is a recipe for a technical disaster.

programme.title: Dead By Dawn E5
programme.desc: The forests of India play host to nightly battle of life or death before dawn. A forest of illusions that is home to giant bats, venomous serpents, assassins, tricksters and beasts beyond your imagination. A secret world that hides in the darkness, showing you India like you have never seen it before.

programme.title: Snakes In The City S4E7
programme.desc: A large black mamba hides inside a TV, a nun is on the run from a spitting cobra and a baby python is stuck inside an air-con unit.

programme.title: Wild Hunters: Deadly Killers Of Africa
programme.desc: Journey across Africa exploring the continent's most iconic and deadliest predators. Cats, crocs and canines battle every day for survival using a combination of finely tuned weapons and hunting strategies. These African stories are a show of raw power, strength and endurance. An awe-inspiring display of the fierce, everyday battles fought in the wild.

programme.title: Fish Tank Kings S2E15
programme.desc: One of New York's hotels is looking to build upon its reputation. Living Color must create a tank that is unique and must also serve a practical purpose. programme.title: Wild Hunters: Deadly Killers Of Africa

Cats, crocs and canines battle every day for survival using a combination of finely tuned weapons and hunting strategies. These African stories are a show of raw power, strength and endurance. An awe-inspiring display of the fierce, everyday battles fought in the wild.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Zoo S2E7
programme.desc: A Mandrill named Tatu has keepers working around the clock in a life or death struggle to solve a medical mystery and save its life. Cedric the anaconda hasn't eaten in months but no one knows why its suddenly turned its nose up at food, and a blue-eyed goat named Talula has a date with the dentist, but only of her keepers can catch her.

programme.title: Monster Fish S4E2 !
programme.desc: Nicknamed the “linebackers of the sea” for their wide, stalky bodies, bull sharks are rumored to be moving inland, even surviving in freshwater 2,000 miles upriver. To separate fact from fiction, Zeb Hogan is teaming up with some of Florida's leading shark experts on a quest to catch a “river shark” and to determine the truth behind their deadly reputation.

programme.title: When Sharks Attack S5E3
programme.desc: The Seychelles is best known as an idyllic escape for honeymooners, thanks to its crystal-clear waters and powder white sands. But in 2011 the archipelago is rocked by a terrifying series of events - two deadly shark attacks in two weeks. The incidents leave locals and vacationers in shock, with many people too scared to go back into the water. Desperate to bring peace back to the paradise island, the local government calls in experts to investigate what's behind these tragic events.

programme.title: Hunter Hunted S4E3
programme.desc: In the fourth season of this popular show, Hunter & Hunted continues to investigate selective animal attacks on humans, employing the latest in forensic technology and scientific discovery to deconstruct and analyze some of the most startling incidents on record.

programme.title: Snakes In The City S4E8
programme.desc: Simon and Siouxsie chase down mambas all over the city and they call in the fire brigade to help Simon with one of his most dangerous captures yet!

programme.title: Big Cat Moms: Lessons In Survival
programme.desc: With a mash-up of some of our most popular and iconic big cat stories - we will explore the world of feline motherhood in a one-hour companion piece to the 'Tiger Moms' premiere.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Zoo S2E8
programme.desc: The entire zoo is on baby watch as Phoebe the elephant goes into labor. It could be three days or 30 days before the big event but no matter how long Phoebe's keepers aren't going anywhere until she delivers. A dentist makes a house call to perform a root canal on Aurora the Polar Bear, and a family of flying foxes, better known as bats, get their annual exam.

programme.title: Monster Fish S1E2
programme.desc: Follow Zeb Hogan on his journey to find the largest freshwater fish in Australia. Although the huge freshwater sawfish are on the verge of extinction, Northern Australia is still a stronghold of this monster. After learning about their amazing hunting technique in a wildlife park in Darwin, Zeb heads to the Fitzroy River, where he catches and studies the sawfish with scientist David Morgan.

programme.desc: Instinct stars Alan Cumming as a former CIA operative who is lured back to his old life when the NYPD needs his help to stop a serial killer.

programme.title: Get Shorty E1
programme.desc: Miles Daly, a muscle for a Nevada crime ring and desperate to win back his wife and daughter, travels to Los Angeles to collect on a debt from an aspiring screenwriter – whose script inspires Miles to give Hollywood a shot.

programme.title: Get Shorty E2
programme.desc: Miles returns to Los Angeles in an attempt to pitch the script for 'The Admiral's Mistress' to Rick Moreweather, a film producer; Amara takes an interest in investing in the film, triggering anxiety in Louis and anger in Yago.

programme.title: Bluff City Law E8

programme.title: Bluff City Law E9
programme.desc: Elijah and Sydney help a catholic teacher who is fired after undergoing IVF treatment. Anthony gets involved with Briana's nephew when he is prohibited from competing on the wrestling team.

programme.title: Hard Time E8
programme.desc: The number of addicts and mentally ill inmates is an ongoing problem for prisons and jails across the country, Clark County Detention Center is no exception. Within the walls of the jail, hundreds of addicts and mentally ill are further imprisoned within their own minds. For some, the only way to break the cycle of incarceration is to acknowledge their illnesses and seek help.

programme.title: Hard Time E9
programme.desc: Las Vegas draws people from all walks of life, and its jail is no different. With new inmates constantly pouring in, one of the hardest jobs for officers is organizing and keeping the inmates safe. In this dangerous world, and not fitting in is doubly so. Spend time with 3 inmates who, for one reason or another, simply don't fit in and must make difficult decisions in order to survive.

programme.title: Hard Time E5
programme.desc: Across the street from the Clark County Detention Center is the County Courthouse. Each day hundreds of inmates are collected from their jail cells and herded through the underground network of tunnels that connect the two buildings to face a Judge. Experience a jury trial from the perspective of 3 inmates as they go through the life-changing ordeal of a trial, judgment, and finally a verdict.

programme.title: Hard Time E6
programme.desc: The Clark County Detention Center handles more than 80,000 people each year. For many inmates, a stay in jail is a harsh wake-up call and a one-time stop. But for thousands of offenders hooked on drugs and alcohol, CCDC has become a revolving door. Through the eyes of two very different inmates, witness the triumphs and tragedies in the fight to break free from the shackles of addiction.

programme.title: Hard Time E7
programme.desc: Las Vegas is a crossroad for major gangs of California and the Southwest, and at the Clark County Detention Center, inmates and officers are constantly under pressure from gang activity. For some, survival in the jail comes down to reputation and intimidation, and many will bend or break. That's where the Gang Special Investigations Unit steps in, the administration's detectives.

programme.title: CSI Miami E7
programme.desc: A high stakes poker game is disrupted by a masked assassin, leaving one player dead and the CSIs baffled.

programme.title: CSI Miami E8
programme.desc: When Horatio finds another corpse with missing eyes, everything points to his nemesis, “The Taunter” – except he has an airtight alibi.

programme.title: CSI E6
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates a shooting at a Koreatown neighborhood party, in which the mother and uncle of a small boy, Park Bang, are murdered. Grissom stakes a personal investment in the case when it is discovered that Park Bang witnessed the shooting and he goes missing. Grissom suspects the killer tracked Park down and is trying to keep him from talking, the case becomes more complicated when it's revealed Park has HIV and his mother put him on an unauthorized medical trial.

programme.title: CSI E7
programme.desc: Greg, Riley, and Brass investigate the death of a woman and the beating of her daughter who falls into a coma. They discover the women's husband is a suspect in the murder of a private investigator, Trevor Murphy and Trevor's kids may be bent on getting revenge for their dad's murder at any cost. Catherine and Nick investigate when two teenagers crash their car into a tree and die and uncover a deadly game of mailbox baseball. In the meantime, Grissom attends the trial of Natalie Davis.

programme.title: Proven Innocent E10
programme.desc: Madeline and the team are determined to prove a Navy SEAL's innocence. Levi presses harder for insight on Rosemary's life in high school, as Bellows takes a drastic step in reexamining her murder.

programme.title: Proven Innocent E11
programme.desc: The team takes on the case of a mother, who is serving a life sentence for shaking her infant daughter, leading to her death. Meanwhile, Levi and Madeline uncover more truths about Rosemary's past.

programme.title: Proven Innocent E12
programme.sub-title: In Defense Of Madeline Scott, I
programme.desc: Easy takes on an immigration case to help a young DREAMer, who was convicted of murder. Madeline and the gang intensify their investigation into who killed Rosemary, as her showdown with Bellows begins.

programme.title: Proven Innocent E13
programme.sub-title: In Defense Of Madeline Scott, II
programme.desc: With Madeline's freedom at stake, Easy's defense hits a bump in the road. The team must band together to focus on solving Rosemary's murder once and for all before time runs out.

programme.title: Las Vegas E7
programme.desc: As they prepare their youth football team for the Casino League Championship game, Danny and Mike search for a missing casino employee and aspiring inventor whose hobby may have gotten him into serious trouble.

programme.title: Las Vegas E8
programme.desc: Ed, Danny, and Mike combine forces with Dr. Jordan Cavanaugh and Det. Woody Hoyt to solve the murder of a high-stakes gambler.

programme.title: Las Vegas E9
programme.desc: Ed uses his past connections to hunt down the man who stole a priceless artwork from the Montecito – which leads to an uncomfortable reunion with his former CIA protege, who cannot be trusted.

programme.title: Las Vegas E10
programme.desc: Ed and Mike piece together the clues of a possible kidnapping. Their efforts lead to a man with a criminal past and also force Mike to recall a terrible memory from his childhood.

programme.title: Las Vegas E11
programme.desc: After Sam learns that one of her clients is illegally laundering drug money through the Montecito, she agrees to help the FBI capture several key members of the cartel to help put an end to them.

programme.title: Hard Time E4
programme.desc: When crime is committed in Vegas, the criminal stays in the Clark County Detention Center, a co-ed jail mere minutes away from the Strip. Though men and women are held in the same facility, they are worlds apart. It's a world of contradictions, from extreme aggression to intense affection. Explore this world from the point-of-view of a singularly intimate and intimidating role, the Jail Mom.

programme.title: Hard Time E5
programme.desc: Across the street from the Clark County Detention Center is the County Courthouse. Each day hundreds of inmates are collected from their jail cells and herded through the underground network of tunnels that connect the two buildings to face a Judge. Experience a jury trial from the perspective of 3 inmates as they go through the life-changing ordeal of a trial, judgment, and finally a verdict.

For some, survival in the jail comes down to reputation and intimidation, and many will bend or break. That's where the Gang Special Investigations Unit steps in, the administration's detectives.

programme.title: Bluff City Law E9
programme.desc: Elijah and Sydney help a catholic teacher who is fired after undergoing IVF treatment. Anthony gets involved with Briana's nephew when he is prohibited from competing on the wrestling team.

programme.title: Emergence E10
programme.desc: After months of dead ends, the Evans family receives information that could finally lead them to Piper.

programme.title: CSI Miami E9
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate when three convicted murderers are released from prison and someone starts killing them one by one.

programme.title: CSI E6
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates a shooting at a Koreatown neighborhood party, in which the mother and uncle of a small boy, Park Bang, are murdered. Grissom stakes a personal investment in the case when it is discovered that Park Bang witnessed the shooting and he goes missing. Grissom suspects the killer tracked Park down and is trying to keep him from talking, the case becomes more complicated when it's revealed Park has HIV and his mother put him on an unauthorized medical trial.

programme.title: CSI E7
programme.desc: Greg, Riley, and Brass investigate the death of a woman and the beating of her daughter who falls into a coma. They discover the women's husband is a suspect in the murder of a private investigator, Trevor Murphy and Trevor's kids may be bent on getting revenge for their dad's murder at any cost. Catherine and Nick investigate when two teenagers crash their car into a tree and die and uncover a deadly game of mailbox baseball. In the meantime, Grissom attends the trial of Natalie Davis.

programme.title: Las Vegas E13
programme.desc: Chaos is set in motion when Danny and Delinda find a hotel guest who appears to have committed suicide. When Delinda investigates further, she suspects murder and has Danny and Ed find the killer.

programme.title: Las Vegas E14
programme.desc: Danny is charged with sexual misconduct by a beautiful construction company CEO after being thrown out of the Montecito. Ed must use old contacts to ensure justice prevails.

programme.title: Las Vegas E15
programme.desc: Ed receives an unexpected visit from a beautiful former coworker, whose mere presence puts everyone's lives in danger. Danny and Mike are enlisted to protect her, and find it much harder than expected.

programme.title: Get Shorty E1
programme.desc: Miles Daly, a muscle for a Nevada crime ring and desperate to win back his wife and daughter, travels to Los Angeles to collect on a debt from an aspiring screenwriter – whose script inspires Miles to give Hollywood a shot.

programme.title: Get Shorty E2
programme.desc: Miles returns to Los Angeles in an attempt to pitch the script for 'The Admiral's Mistress' to Rick Moreweather, a film producer; Amara takes an interest in investing in the film, triggering anxiety in Louis and anger in Yago.

programme.title: Get Shorty E3
programme.desc: Rick slowly begins to discover the unconventional ways Miles and Louis handle their business. Miles notices a growing distance between him and his family, and attempts to bring them to Los Angeles for the summer.

programme.title: Hard Time E7
programme.desc: Las Vegas is a crossroad for major gangs of California and the Southwest, and at the Clark County Detention Center, inmates and officers are constantly under pressure from gang activity. For some, survival in the jail comes down to reputation and intimidation, and many will bend or break. That's where the Gang Special Investigations Unit steps in, the administration's detectives.

programme.title: Hard Time E8
programme.desc: The number of addicts and mentally ill inmates is an ongoing problem for prisons and jails across the country, Clark County Detention Center is no exception. Within the walls of the jail, hundreds of addicts and mentally ill are further imprisoned within their own minds. For some, the only way to break the cycle of incarceration is to acknowledge their illnesses and seek help.

programme.title: Hard Time E9
programme.desc: Las Vegas draws people from all walks of life, and its jail is no different. With new inmates constantly pouring in, one of the hardest jobs for officers is organizing and keeping the inmates safe. In this dangerous world, and not fitting in is doubly so. Spend time with 3 inmates who, for one reason or another, simply don't fit in and must make difficult decisions in order to survive.

programme.title: Hard Time E10
programme.desc: Clark County Detention Center is a sobering jail in the middle of the glitz and glam of the Strip. But getting booked here affects more than arrestees, family and friends on the outside often share the heartache of the jail sentence. Loved ones must navigate an intimidating world where visits lasts only 30 minutes a day. It's this stress that can drive some families closer and others apart.

programme.title: Las Vegas S2E16 ?
programme.sub-title: Can You See What I See
programme.desc: When the hotel enters one of its slowest weeks of the year, Ed decides to stir things up a bit by switching everyone's job positions around so they can walk in one another's shoes.

programme.title: Get Shorty S1E3
programme.desc: Rick slowly begins to discover the unconventional ways Miles and Louis handle their business. Miles notices a growing distance between him and his family, and attempts to bring them to Los Angeles for the summer.

programme.title: Get Shorty S1E4
programme.desc: As Miles' Hollywood producer facade becomes more legitimate, those associated with him become more disgruntled; Louis feels left out, April feels duped and Rick feels uneasy as he confronts his past artistic endeavors and the business deal with Amara.

programme.title: Hard Time S4E10
programme.desc: Clark County Detention Center is a sobering jail in the middle of the glitz and glam of the Strip. But getting booked here affects more than arrestees, family and friends on the outside often share the heartache of the jail sentence. Loved ones must navigate an intimidating world where visits lasts only 30 minutes a day. It's this stress that can drive some families closer and others apart.

programme.title: Hard Time S4E11
programme.desc: Just like Sin City, the Clark County Detention Center never sleeps. It's a 'round the clock operation, where challenges come daily. From feeding the inmates to combating riots, keeping the peace comes down to the officers. In a world where people's freedom has been taken from them, even the smallest rule must be followed or chaos will ensue.

programme.title: Hard Time S4E12
programme.desc: Clark County Detention Center is home to first-timers and violent offenders all waiting for their day in court. Whether it's through cases in court or violations behind bars, some inmates are always trying to beat the system. Each trying to fight the system in their own way, and it is up to the judicial system and Officers to investigate and decide on an inmate's fate.

programme.title: Situation Critical E1
programme.desc: On February 28th, 1997, LAPD officers spot a robbery in progress while on routine patrol. But the situation that follows is about to turn Hollywood movie-nasty. For 40 minutes, the robbers easily outgun the LAPD in one of the most violent shootouts in US history. Squad cars are destroyed and nine officers and two civilians are shot in a hail of more than 1,100 rounds. But, miraculously, only the perpetrators die. How did two men keep dozens of fully armed police officers at bay? How did police keep themselves and many civilians from being fatally shot? How were the two criminals finally subdued?

programme.title: Hard Time S4E12
programme.desc: Clark County Detention Center is home to first-timers and violent offenders all waiting for their day in court. Whether it's through cases in court or violations behind bars, some inmates are always trying to beat the system. Each trying to fight the system in their own way, and it is up to the judicial system and Officers to investigate and decide on an inmate's fate.

programme.title: Situation Critical E1
programme.desc: On February 28th, 1997, LAPD officers spot a robbery in progress while on routine patrol. But the situation that follows is about to turn Hollywood movie-nasty. For 40 minutes, the robbers easily outgun the LAPD in one of the most violent shootouts in US history. Squad cars are destroyed and nine officers and two civilians are shot in a hail of more than 1,100 rounds. But, miraculously, only the perpetrators die. How did two men keep dozens of fully armed police officers at bay? How did police keep themselves and many civilians from being fatally shot? How were the two criminals finally subdued?

programme.title: Situation Critical E2
programme.desc: On Friday, June 2nd 1995, Captain Scott O'Grady is patrolling a NATO no-fly zone over Bosnia when his F-16 aircraft bursts into flames after being hit by a Bosnian Serb missile. The fighter pilot ejects from his disintegrating plane and parachutes to earth, landing deep in hostile territory. With armed militia hot on his heels, OGrady dives into the undergrowth. Moments later his pursuers pass five feet from his head. For six days, OGrady evades capture, moving only by night, desperately trying to establish radio contact with his comrades. On the sixth night, a pilot from OGradys air base finally hears his radio call, setting into motion a daring, daylight rescue mission by U.S. Marines.
